title: 03/01/2021 - HOUR 1 - Watson, Clippers, Wilson, Bears, Watt
itunes:title: 03/01/2021 - HOUR 1 - Watson, Clippers, Wilson, Bears, Watt
description:
It's time for the Texans to trade Deshaun Watson

The Clippers have chemistry issues and Kawhi Leonard isn't a vocal leader

Russell Wilson probably wants to play in a bigger market like Dallas

The Bears can't seem to get their QB situation right

J. J. Watt signing with the Cardinals


Guest: Albert Breer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
